commits.message:
EUCA-6010
Hack added alongside the others that suspend updates. Just like when an expando is open, this will stop the incessant reloads when you aren't on page 1. No, I don't like it. But for now we might be stuck with it. jQuery Datatables knows how to save state and return to the page you were on across page reloads, but something about the way we're loading the data into it breaks that.
